name: Run Assassin, Run!
description:
This is my first ever game that I am making public. I know it sucks and buggy, that's why I'm not even asking to donate, I'm just putting it here for people to play!

Please let me know if you liked it, all I'm looking for is a review of different gamers, I'm all open for criticism...Please go easy on me :-(

Contact: gman9906@gmail.com
